articles.headline: Gas Shortages Awaken Britain to Some Crucial Workers: Truck Drivers
articles.snippet: Dwindling pay, poor roadside conditions and post-Brexit immigration rules have led to a critical shortage of drivers. Despite appeals, some say they are reluctant to return.
articles.abstract: Dwindling pay, poor roadside conditions and post-Brexit immigration rules have led to a critical shortage of drivers. Despite appeals, some say they are reluctant to return.
articles.lead_paragraph: LONDON — For more than three decades David Carden drove across England’s Midlands, transporting tens of thousands of liters of fuel from holding tanks to service stations. The flammable liquid made it a dangerous job requiring skill and caution, but when he started the pay and the benefits were good, enabling him to support his young family.
articles.byline: By Eshe Nelson and Megan Specia

articles.headline: Democrats Move to Avert Shutdown, but Divisions Imperil Biden’s Agenda
articles.snippet: Democrats prepared a spending bill to keep the government funded past a Thursday deadline, but moderates dug in harder against their ambitious social safety net bill.
articles.abstract: Democrats prepared a spending bill to keep the government funded past a Thursday deadline, but moderates dug in harder against their ambitious social safety net bill.
articles.lead_paragraph: Follow our live news coverage on the government shutdown and infrastructure bill.
articles.byline: By Emily Cochrane and Jim Tankersley

articles.headline: ‘Stalkerware’ Apps Are Proliferating. Protect Yourself.
articles.snippet: These spyware apps record your conversations, location and everything you type, all while camouflaged as a calculator or calendar.
articles.abstract: These spyware apps record your conversations, location and everything you type, all while camouflaged as a calculator or calendar.
articles.lead_paragraph: It looked like a calculator app. But it was actually spyware recording my every keystroke — the type of data that would give a stalker unfettered access to my private life.

articles.headline: Kyrsten Sinema Is at the Center of It All. Some Arizonans Wish She Weren’t.
articles.snippet: The centrist senator is key to President Biden’s agenda in Washington. Her positions have angered some Democrats back home.
articles.abstract: The centrist senator is key to President Biden’s agenda in Washington. Her positions have angered some Democrats back home.
articles.lead_paragraph: PHOENIX — Jade Duran once spent her weekends knocking on doors to campaign for Senator Kyrsten Sinema, the stubbornly centrist Democrat whose vote could seal the fate of a vast Democratic effort to remake America’s social safety net. But no more.
articles.byline: By Jack Healy and Emily Cochrane
